name: STONEHEDGE SQUARE LIMITED PARTNERSHIP, Respondent, v. MOVIE MERCHANTS, INC., d/b/a Movie Merchants, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Stonehedge Square Ltd. Partnership v. Movie Merchants, Inc.
docket_number: Petition No. 761 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1996

parties: STONEHEDGE SQUARE LIMITED PARTNERSHIP, Respondent, v. MOVIE MERCHANTS, INC., d/b/a Movie Merchants, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18th day of July, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED BUT LIMITED to the following:
Whether the Superior Court’s decision to rely on this Court’s decision in Auer v. Penn, 99 Pa. 370 (1882) was improper?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jordan D. Cunningham and Edwin A.D. Schwartz, Harrisburg, for Petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
696 A.2d 805
STONEHEDGE SQUARE LIMITED PARTNERSHIP, Respondent, v. MOVIE MERCHANTS, INC., d/b/a Movie Merchants, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 18, 1997.
Jordan D. Cunningham and Edwin A.D. Schwartz, Harrisburg, for Petitioner.
